MonetDB Configuration Options
Name Default Changeable
monetdb.default_hostname localhost PHP_INI_ALL
monetdb.default_language mil PHP_INI_ALL
monetdb.default_password monetdb PHP_INI_ALL
monetdb.default_port 50000 PHP_INI_ALL
monetdb.default_username monetdb PHP_INI_ALL
For further details and definition of the PHP_INI_* constants see ini_set.
&ini.descriptions.title;
monetdb.default_hostname string
The default name of MonetDB running host we want to connect to.
monetdb.default_language string
The default language used for communication with MonetDB. MonetDB supports (depending on installed extensions) a whole set of languages, including: mil (default), sql, mal, xcore, xquery and more.
monetdb.default_password string
The password used by default for connecting with MonetDB server.
monetdb.default_port integer
The default TCP port used for connection with MonetDB server. Please note, that for various languages supported by MonetDB, various port numbers may have to be used.
monetdb.default_username string
The user name used by default for connecting with MonetDB server.
